sentences.en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
sentences.cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

sentences.en: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.cn: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.en: Changing your eating habits is the best way to lose weight.
sentences.cn: 改变饮食习惯是减肥的最佳方法。

sentences.en: Do you feel like you could do with a change?
sentences.cn: 你想不想改变一下？

sentences.en: Does such an attitudinal change reflect real experiences in daily life?
sentences.cn: 人生观的这种转变是否反映了日常生活中的真实遭遇？

sentences.en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

sentences.en: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.en: He argues that he is the true candidate of change.
sentences.cn: 他争辩说他才是真正能带来变革的候选人。

sentences.en: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.en: I have to change my approach, the competition is too good now.
sentences.cn: 我得改变方法，现在的竞争对手太强。

sentences.en: It is wishful thinking to expect deeper change under his leadership.
sentences.cn: 指望在他的领导下发生更深层次的变革简直是痴心妄想。

sentences.en: it's nice to be pampered for a change.
sentences.cn: 偶尔被关照一下还挺好的。

sentences.en: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.cn: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

sentences.en: Midland decided to change the way it credited payments to accounts.
sentences.cn: 米兰银行决定改变付款贷记的方式。

sentences.en: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.cn: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.en: Only with mass direct action will we obtain such change.
sentences.cn: 只有采取大规模直接行动，我们才会取得这样的改变。

sentences.en: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.cn: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentences.cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentences.en: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.cn: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentences.cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentences.en: Susan has changed a lot since I last saw her.
sentences.cn: 自从我上次见到苏珊之后，她变了许多。

sentences.en: The change proposed last month was foreshadowed in the March Budget.
sentences.cn: 上个月提议的变动在3月份的预算中已经有所预兆了。

sentences.en: The leaves on trees change colour in the autumn.
sentences.cn: 树叶在秋天改变颜色。

sentences.en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
sentences.cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

sentences.en: They have no wish for any change in the status quo.
sentences.cn: 他们不想改变现状。

sentences.en: Today, his change of direction seems more in tune with the times.
sentences.cn: 今天，他方向的改变似乎更与时代合拍。

words.tran_cn: 无常的；可改变的；易变的；不定的
易变的；富于变化的；不稳定的
转换开关装置；改变者（change的名词形式）
改变（change的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.phrase: a change is as good as a rest

phrases.tran_cn: 改换环境（多指易地疗养）
轮流：同时做两项任务时交替着做或以交替的方式做一项工作
（尤指为适应情况变化而）改口（或改变做法），见风使舵
对换，对调位置；改变成；转接
（尤指为避免尴尬而）转换话题
改变心意；改变你的想法；改变你的观点
与惯常相反；为了变变花样
全球变化；全世界性变化
改变说法；改变安排；改变做法

trans.tran_cn: 变化，变革，替代物，找零，硬币，换车
trans.tran_en: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

trans.tran_cn: 变化，更换，交换，给(婴儿)换尿布，转乘，兑换(货币)，换挡
trans.tran_en: to become different, or to make something become different
to become different, or to make something become different
to become different, or to make something become different
to become different, or to make something become different
